info.title: EigenExplorer API
info.description: EigenExplorer is a community-driven data platform for EigenLayer AVS.

get.description: Returns summary metrics, including TVLs for both restaking strategies and the beacon chain ETH strategy, as well as the total number of AVS, operators, and stakers.

tvl.description: The total value locked in all EigenLayer AVS

tvlRestaking.description: The total value locked in all restaking strategies

additionalProperties.description: The total value locked in the strategy

tvlStrategies.description: The total value locked in each restaking strategy

tvlBeaconChain.description: The total value locked in the beacon chain ETH strategy

get.description: Returns the total value locked (TVL) in all restaking strategies and beacon chain restaking.

200.description: The value of the combined TVL.

tvl.description: The value of the combined TVL

get.description: Returns the total value locked (TVL) in the Beacon Chain restaking eigen pods

200.description: The value of the Beacon Chain restaking TVL.

tvl.description: The value of the Beacon Chain restaking TVL

get.description: Returns the combined total value locked (TVL) across all restaking strategies, along with a breakdown of the TVL for each individual strategy.

200.description: The value of combined restaking strategy TVL and a breakdown of the TVL for each individual strategy.

tvl.description: The value of the combined restaking strategies TVL

additionalProperties.description: The total value locked in the strategy

tvlStrategies.description: The total value locked in each restaking strategy

get.summary: Retrieve a strategy TVL by name
get.description: Returns the total value locked (TVL) in a specific LST strategy.

parameters.name: strategy
parameters.description: The name of the restaking strategy

schema.description: The name of the restaking strategy

200.description: The value of combined restaking strategy TVL and a breakdown of the TVL for each individual strategy.

tvl.description: The value of the restaking strategy TVL

get.description: Returns the total number of AVS registered.

200.description: The total number of AVS registered.

totalAvs.description: The total number of AVS registered

get.summary: Retrieve total number of AVS operators
get.description: Returns the total number of AVS operators registered.

200.description: The total number of AVS operators registered.

totalOperators.description: The total number of AVS operators registered

get.summary: Retrieve total number of AVS stakers
get.description: Returns the total number of AVS stakers registered.

200.description: The total number of AVS stakers registered.

totalStakers.description: The total number of AVS stakers registered

get.description: Returns all AVS records. This endpoint supports pagination.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip for pagination

schema.description: The number of records to skip for pagination

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: The number of records to return for pagination

schema.description: The number of records to return for pagination

parameters.name: withTvl
parameters.description: Toggle whether the route should calculate the TVL from shares

schema.description: Toggle whether the route should calculate the TVL from shares

metadataDiscord.description: The URL of the AVS's Discord server

metadataLogo.description: The URL of the AVS's logo

metadataTelegram.description: The URL of the AVS's Telegram channel

metadataWebsite.description: The URL of the AVS's website

metadataX.description: The URL of the AVS's X

tags.description: The tags associated with the AVS

strategyAddress.description: The contract address of the restaking strategy

shares.description: The amount of shares held in the strategy
The strategy shares held in the AVS

totalOperators.description: The total number of operators operating the AVS

totalStakers.description: The total number of stakers staking in the AVS

tvl.description: The combined TVL of all restaking strategies

tvlRestaking.description: The combined TVL of all liquid restaking strategies

tvlWETH.description: The TVL of WETH restaking strategy

tvlBeaconChain.description: The combined TVL of Beacon Chain restaking strategy

tvl.description: The total value locked in the AVS

total.description: Total number of records in the database

skip.description: The number of skiped records for this query

take.description: The number of records returned for this query

get.description: Returns a list of all AVS addresses. This page supports pagination.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip for pagination

schema.description: The number of records to skip for pagination

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: The number of records to return for pagination

schema.description: The number of records to return for pagination

total.description: Total number of records in the database

skip.description: The number of skiped records for this query

take.description: The number of records returned for this query

get.description: Returns a single AVS record by address.

parameters.name: withTvl
parameters.description: Toggle whether the route should calculate the TVL from shares

schema.description: Toggle whether the route should calculate the TVL from shares

metadataDiscord.description: The URL of the AVS's Discord server

metadataLogo.description: The URL of the AVS's logo

metadataTelegram.description: The URL of the AVS's Telegram channel

metadataWebsite.description: The URL of the AVS's website

metadataX.description: The URL of the AVS's X

tags.description: The tags associated with the AVS

strategyAddress.description: The contract address of the restaking strategy

shares.description: The amount of shares held in the strategy
The strategy shares held in the AVS

totalOperators.description: The total number of operators operating the AVS

totalStakers.description: The total number of stakers staking in the AVS

tvl.description: The combined TVL of all restaking strategies

tvlRestaking.description: The combined TVL of all liquid restaking strategies

tvlWETH.description: The TVL of WETH restaking strategy

tvlBeaconChain.description: The combined TVL of Beacon Chain restaking strategy

tvl.description: The total value locked in the AVS

get.summary: Retrieve all stakers for a given AVS address
get.description: Returns all stakers for a given AVS address. This endpoint supports pagination.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip for pagination

schema.description: The number of records to skip for pagination

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: The number of records to return for pagination

schema.description: The number of records to return for pagination

200.description: The stakers record found for the AVS.

address.description: The contract address of the staker

stakerAddress.description: The contract address of the staker

strategyAddress.description: The contract address of the restaking strategy

shares.description: The amount of shares held in the strategy

tvl.description: The total value locked in the AVS staker

total.description: Total number of records in the database

skip.description: The number of skiped records for this query

take.description: The number of records returned for this query

get.summary: Retrieve all operators for a given AVS address
get.description: Returns all operators for a given AVS address. This endpoint supports pagination.

parameters.description: The number of records to skip for pagination

parameters.description: The number of records to return for pagination

parameters.description: Toggle whether the route should calculate the TVL from shares

shares.description: The amount of shares held in the strategy
The strategy shares held in the AVS operator

totalStakers.description: The total number of stakers opted into the AVS operator

tvl.description: The combined TVL of all restaking strategies

tvlRestaking.description: The combined TVL of all liquid restaking strategies

tvlWETH.description: The TVL of WETH restaking strategy

tvlBeaconChain.description: The combined TVL of Beacon Chain restaking strategy

tvl.description: The total value locked in the AVS operator

total.description: Total number of records in the database

skip.description: The number of skiped records for this query

get.description: Returns an operator record by address.

parameters.name: withTvl
parameters.description: Toggle whether the route should calculate the TVL from shares

schema.description: Toggle whether the route should calculate the TVL from shares

200.description: The record of the requested operator.

address.description: The contract address of the AVS operator

metadataName.description: The name of the AVS operator

metadataDescription.description: The description of the AVS operator
metadataDescription.example: This is an example AVS operator

metadataDiscord.description: The URL of the AVS operator's Discord server

metadataLogo.description: The URL of the AVS operator's logo

metadataTelegram.description: The URL of the AVS operator's Telegram channel

metadataWebsite.description: The URL of the AVS operator's website

metadataX.description: The URL of the AVS operator's X

strategyAddress.description: The contract address of the restaking strategy

shares.description: The amount of shares held in the strategy
The strategy shares held in the AVS operator

totalStakers.description: The total number of stakers opted into the AVS operator

tvl.description: The combined TVL of all restaking strategies

tvlRestaking.description: The combined TVL of all liquid restaking strategies

tvlWETH.description: The TVL of WETH restaking strategy

tvlBeaconChain.description: The combined TVL of Beacon Chain restaking strategy

tvl.description: The total value locked in the AVS operator

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

401.description: Although the HTTP standard specifies "unauthorized", semantically this response means "unauthenticated". That is, the client must authenticate itself to get the requested response.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

403.description: The client does not have access rights to the content; that is, it is unauthorized, so the server is refusing to give the requested resource. Unlike 401 Unauthorized, the client's identity is known to the server.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

404.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

422.description: The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

429.description: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time ("rate limiting")

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

500.description: The server has encountered a situation it does not know how to handle.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code
